alert.note: Alert for Blount; Jefferson (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 1:54PM CDT until June 14 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BLOUNT AND NORTHEASTERN JEFFERSON COUNTIES... At 154 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Argo, or near Springville, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Trussville, Oneonta, Center Point, Clay, Pinson, Altoona, Snead, Susan Moore, Allgood, Rosa, Chalkville, Inland Lake, Grayson Valley, Highland Lake, Palmerdale, Holly Springs, Village Springs, Remlap and Clear Springs. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
